016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.keystores;
017
018import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.Configuration;
019import com.exoreaction.xorcery.secrets.Secrets;
020import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.MissingNode;
021import org.apache.logging.log4j.LogManager;
022import org.bouncycastle.asn1.ASN1ObjectIdentifier;
023import org.bouncycastle.asn1.x500.X500Name;
024import org.bouncycastle.asn1.x509.BasicConstraints;
025import org.bouncycastle.cert.jcajce.JcaX509CertificateConverter;
026import org.bouncycastle.cert.jcajce.JcaX509v3CertificateBuilder;
027import org.bouncycastle.jce.provider.BouncyCastleProvider;
028import org.bouncycastle.operator.ContentSigner;
029import org.bouncycastle.operator.OperatorCreationException;
030import org.bouncycastle.operator.jcajce.JcaContentSignerBuilder;
031
032import javax.net.ssl.TrustManager;
033import javax.net.ssl.TrustManagerFactory;
034import javax.net.ssl.X509TrustManager;
035import java.io.*;
036import java.math.BigInteger;
037import java.net.URL;
038import java.security.*;
039import java.security.cert.Certificate;
040import java.security.cert.CertificateException;
041import java.security.cert.X509Certificate;
042import java.util.Calendar;
043import java.util.Date;
044import java.util.Map;
045import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap;
046
047import static com.exoreaction.xorcery.lang.Exceptions.unwrap;
048
049public class KeyStores {
050
051    private final KeyStoresConfiguration configuration;
052    private final Secrets secrets;
053    private final Map<String, KeyStore> keyStores = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
054    private final KeyPairGenerator keyGen;
055
056    public KeyStores(Configuration configuration, Secrets secrets) throws NoSuchAlgorithmException, NoSuchProviderException {
057        this.configuration = new KeyStoresConfiguration(configuration.getConfiguration("keystores"));
058        this.secrets = secrets;
059
060        Provider p = new org.bouncycastle.jce.provider.BouncyCastleProvider();
061        if (null == Security.getProvider(p.getName())) {
062            Security.addProvider(p);
063        }
064
065        keyGen = KeyPairGenerator.getInstance("EC", "BC");
066        keyGen.initialize(256, new SecureRandom());
067    }
068
069    /**
070     * Called when keyStore is changed through save. Subclasses may override this method in order to act when
071     * a keystore is changed.
072     *
073     * @param keyStore the key-store that has changed.
074     */
075    protected void publish(KeyStore keyStore) {
076    }
077
078    public KeyStore getKeyStore(String configurationPrefix) {
079        return keyStores.computeIfAbsent(configurationPrefix, this::loadKeyStore
080        );
081    }
082
083    public void save(KeyStore keyStore) throws IOException, CertificateException, KeyStoreException, NoSuchAlgorithmException {
084        for (Map.Entry<String, KeyStore> stringKeyStoreEntry : keyStores.entrySet()) {
085            if (stringKeyStoreEntry.getValue() == keyStore) {
086                String name = stringKeyStoreEntry.getKey();
087                KeyStoreConfiguration keyStoreConfiguration = configuration.getKeyStoreConfiguration(name);
088                URL keyStoreUrl = keyStoreConfiguration.getURL();
089                File file = new File(keyStoreUrl.getFile()).getCanonicalFile();
090                try (FileOutputStream outputStream = new FileOutputStream(file)) {
091                    keyStore.store(outputStream, keyStoreConfiguration.getPassword().map(secrets::getSecretString).map(String::toCharArray).orElse(null));
092                }
093                LogManager.getLogger(getClass()).info("Saved keystore " + name + " to " + file);
094                publish(keyStore);
095                return;
096            }
097        }
098        throw new IllegalArgumentException("Not a managed KeyStore");
099    }
100
101    protected void addDefaultRootCaCertificates(KeyStore trustStore) throws GeneralSecurityException {
102        TrustManagerFactory trustManagerFactory = TrustManagerFactory.getInstance(TrustManagerFactory.getDefaultAlgorithm());
103        // Loads default Root CA certificates (generally, from JAVA_HOME/lib/cacerts)
104        trustManagerFactory.init((KeyStore) null);
105        for (TrustManager trustManager : trustManagerFactory.getTrustManagers()) {
106            if (trustManager instanceof X509TrustManager) {
107                for (X509Certificate acceptedIssuer : ((X509TrustManager) trustManager).getAcceptedIssuers()) {
108                    trustStore.setCertificateEntry(acceptedIssuer.getSubjectX500Principal().getName(), acceptedIssuer);
109                }
110            }
111        }
112    }
113
114    private KeyStore loadKeyStore(String keyStoreName) {
115        URL keyStoreUrl = null;
116        try {
117            KeyStoreConfiguration keyStoreConfiguration = configuration.getKeyStoreConfiguration(keyStoreName);
118            KeyStore keyStore = KeyStore.getInstance(keyStoreConfiguration.getType());
119
120            if (!keyStoreConfiguration.configuration().getJson("template").orElse(MissingNode.getInstance()).isMissingNode()) {
121                File keyStoreOutput = new File(keyStoreConfiguration.getPath()).getCanonicalFile();
122                keyStoreUrl = keyStoreOutput.toURI().toURL();
123                if (!keyStoreOutput.exists()) {
124                    // Copy template to file
125                    URL templateStoreUrl = keyStoreConfiguration.configuration().getResourceURL("template").orElseThrow(() -> new IllegalArgumentException("Template file does not exist for keystore " + keyStoreName));
126                    char[] password = keyStoreConfiguration.getPassword().map(secrets::getSecretString).map(String::toCharArray).orElse(null);
127                    // Copy template to file
128                    try (InputStream inputStream = templateStoreUrl.openStream()) {
129                        LogManager.getLogger(getClass()).info("Copying template keystore " + templateStoreUrl + " to local keystore file " + keyStoreOutput);
130                        File keyStoreDir = keyStoreOutput.getParentFile();
131                        if (!keyStoreDir.exists()) {
132                            keyStoreDir.mkdirs();
133                        }
134                        try (FileOutputStream fileOutputStream = new FileOutputStream(keyStoreOutput)) {
135                            fileOutputStream.write(inputStream.readAllBytes());
136                        }
137                    } catch (FileNotFoundException e) {
138                        // Continue with empty keystore
139                        LogManager.getLogger(getClass()).warn("Could not find template keystore, continuing with empty keystore " + keyStoreName, e);
140                        // Create empty store
141                        keyStore.load(null, password);
142                        File keyStoreDir = keyStoreOutput.getParentFile();
143                        if (!keyStoreDir.exists()) {
144                            keyStoreDir.mkdirs();
145                        }
146                        try (FileOutputStream outputStream = new FileOutputStream(keyStoreOutput)) {
147                            keyStore.store(outputStream, password);
148                        }
149
150                    } catch (IOException e) {
151                        throw new UncheckedIOException("Could not copy template store:" + templateStoreUrl, e);
152                    }
153                }
154            } else {
155                try {
156                    keyStoreUrl = keyStoreConfiguration.getURL();
157                } catch (IllegalArgumentException e) {
158                    // Check if path set but missing keyStore
159                    if (keyStoreConfiguration.configuration().getString("path").isPresent()) {
160                        File file = new File(keyStoreConfiguration.getPath());
161                        // Create empty store
162                        char[] password = keyStoreConfiguration.getPassword().map(secrets::getSecretString).map(String::toCharArray).orElse(null);
163                        keyStore.load(null, password);
164                        File keyStoreDir = file.getParentFile();
165                        if (!keyStoreDir.exists()) {
166                            keyStoreDir.mkdirs();
167                        }
168                        try (FileOutputStream outputStream = new FileOutputStream(file)) {
169                            keyStore.store(outputStream, password);
170                        }
171                        LogManager.getLogger(getClass()).info("Created empty keystore " + keyStoreName);
172
173                        keyStoreUrl = keyStoreConfiguration.getURL();
174                    }
175                }
176            }
177
178            try (InputStream inStream = keyStoreUrl.openStream()) {
179                keyStore.load(inStream, keyStoreConfiguration.getPassword().map(secrets::getSecretString).map(String::toCharArray).orElse(null));
180
181                if (keyStoreConfiguration.isAddRootCa()) {
182                    addDefaultRootCaCertificates(keyStore);
183                }
184
185                LogManager.getLogger(getClass()).info("Loaded keystore " + keyStoreName + "(" + keyStoreUrl + ")");
186                {
187                    StringBuilder builder = new StringBuilder();
188                    keyStore.aliases().asIterator().forEachRemaining(alias -> builder.append("\n").append(alias));
189                    LogManager.getLogger(getClass()).debug(keyStoreName + " aliases:" + builder);
190                }
191
192                return keyStore;
193            } catch (Exception ex) {
194                URL templateStoreUrl = keyStoreConfiguration.getTemplate();
195                if (templateStoreUrl != null && keyStoreUrl.getProtocol().equals("file")) {
196                    // Copy template to file
197                    File keyStoreDir = new File(keyStoreUrl.getFile()).getParentFile();
198                    if (!keyStoreDir.exists()) {
199                        keyStoreDir.mkdirs();
200                    }
201
202                    try (InputStream inputStream = templateStoreUrl.openStream()) {
203                        try (FileOutputStream fileOutputStream = new FileOutputStream(keyStoreUrl.getFile())) {
204                            fileOutputStream.write(inputStream.readAllBytes());
205                        }
206                    }
207                    // Try again
208                    return loadKeyStore(keyStoreName);
209                } else {
210                    throw ex;
211                }
212            }
213        } catch (Throwable e) {
214            throw new RuntimeException("Could not load keystore '" + keyStoreName + "' from " + keyStoreUrl, unwrap(e));
215        }
216    }
217
218    // Utility methods
219    public KeyPair getOrCreateKeyPair(String alias, String keyStoreName) throws KeyStoreException, UnrecoverableKeyException, NoSuchAlgorithmException, CertificateException, IOException, OperatorCreationException {
220        KeyStoreConfiguration keyStoreConfiguration = configuration.getKeyStoreConfiguration(keyStoreName);
221        KeyStore keyStore = getKeyStore(keyStoreName);
222        char[] password = keyStoreConfiguration.getPassword().map(secrets::getSecretString).map(String::toCharArray).orElse(null);
223
224        PrivateKey privateKey = (PrivateKey) keyStore.getKey(alias, password);
225        if (privateKey == null) {
226            KeyPair keyPair = keyGen.generateKeyPair();
227            X509Certificate certificate = selfSign(keyPair, "cn=" + alias);
228            keyStore.setKeyEntry(alias, keyPair.getPrivate(), password, new Certificate[]{certificate});
229            save(keyStore);
230            return keyPair;
231        } else {
232            PublicKey publicKey = keyStore.getCertificate(alias).getPublicKey();
233            return new KeyPair(publicKey, privateKey);
234        }
235    }
236
237    public X509Certificate selfSign(KeyPair keyPair, String subjectDN) throws OperatorCreationException, CertificateException, IOException {
238        Provider bcProvider = new BouncyCastleProvider();
239        Security.addProvider(bcProvider);
240
241        long now = System.currentTimeMillis();
242        Date startDate = new Date(now);
243
244        X500Name dnName = new X500Name(subjectDN);
245        BigInteger certSerialNumber = new BigInteger(Long.toString(now));
246
247        // Basically never expire
248        Calendar calendar = Calendar.getInstance();
249        calendar.setTime(startDate);
250        calendar.add(Calendar.YEAR, 1000);
251
252        Date endDate = calendar.getTime();
253
254        ContentSigner contentSigner = new JcaContentSignerBuilder("SHA256withECDSA")
255                .setProvider("BC")
256                .build(keyPair.getPrivate());
257
258        JcaX509v3CertificateBuilder certBuilder = new JcaX509v3CertificateBuilder(dnName, certSerialNumber, startDate, endDate, dnName, keyPair.getPublic());
259        BasicConstraints basicConstraints = new BasicConstraints(true);
260        certBuilder.addExtension(new ASN1ObjectIdentifier("2.5.29.19"), true, basicConstraints);
261        return new JcaX509CertificateConverter().setProvider(bcProvider).getCertificate(certBuilder.build(contentSigner));
262    }
263}
